name: wps
description: The Weather Research and Forecasting Pre-Processing System (WPS)

dependencies.name: wrf
dependencies.description:
The Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) Model is a next-generation
mesoscale numerical weather prediction system designed for both
atmospheric research and operational forecasting applications.

dependencies.name: netcdf-c
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.

dependencies.name: netcdf-fortran
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the Fortran
distribution.

dependencies.name: tcsh
dependencies.description:
Tcsh is an enhanced but completely compatible version of csh, the C
shell. Tcsh is a command language interpreter which can be used both as
an interactive login shell and as a shell script command processor. Tcsh
includes a command line editor, programmable word completion, spelling
correction, a history mechanism, job control and a C language like
syntax.

dependencies.name: time
dependencies.description:
The time command runs another program, then displays information about
the resources used by that program.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.
